summary: A former footballer living in Brittany enlists his old teammates to help the local fisherman to win some games in order to raise money and save jobs.
cast: José Garcia|Jean-Pierre Marielle|Franck Dubosc|Gad Elmaleh|JoeyStarr|Ramzy Bedia|Omar Sy|Sami Ameziane|Clémentine Baert|Frédérique Bel|Ludovic Berthillot|Chantal Neuwirth|André Penvern|Jean Reno|Claudia Tagbo|François Bureloup|Élisabeth Commelin|Sébastien Libessart|Riton Liebman|Lucas Renault|Elena Zoualegh|Anne Suarez|Vanessa Guide|Nicolas Simon|Christian Jeanpierre|Mathias Honoré|Alban Aumard|Arnaud Henriet|André Chaumeau|Frédéric Maranber|Marc Rioufol|Joe Sheridan|Barnaby Apps|Jeanne Clinchamp|Joël Cudennec|Loïc Baylacq|Christophe Briand|Laurine Sabban|Arno Feffer|Valéry Schatz|Olivier Carbone|Marie-Ange Gaspari|Audrey Hamm|Arsène Mosca|Laurent Biras|Sergio Do Vale|François Lescurat|Pierre-Yves Kerloc'h|Maxime Jacquot|Paul Leblanc Messager|Bruno Bercegeay|David Busson|Mickaël Gratigny|Xavier Kerouanton|Michel Hellio|Loïc Draoulec|Ronan Nézet|Krysten Le Nestic|Erwan Martin|Sylvain Berthou|Julien Chauvel|Fabien Ridard|Mathieu Leroux|Kevin Auregan|Martin Pauvert|Rémi Leblanc Messager|Emmanuel Laniève|Romain Ruel|Marion Ossent
title: Un gran equipo
